name: github-image-markdown
title: Github Image Markdown
description: Formats a screenshot uploaded to Github into reasonable dimension to view.
author: daniellacoste

commands.name: index
commands.title: Github Image Markdown
commands.subtitle: Resize your PR image
commands.description: This extension will reformat images uploaded to a Github PR so that they are reasonably sized. To use, simply put the image on your clipboard, usually in this format: ![IMG_FILENAME](https://imgUrl.com). The new HTML format will be automatically saved to your clipboard.
